benefits: Free/subsidized seeds, fertilizers, and diesel
Targeted at small and marginal farmers
description: Provides essential farming inputs like seeds, fertilizers, and diesel either free or at subsidized rates to support small-scale farmers.

application.method: Apply at local Union Agricultural Office

benefits: Low-interest or interest-free crop loans
Available through various state banks
description: Offers affordable loans for farmers with low or no interest to help them finance their agricultural activities.

benefits: Distribution of climate-resilient high-yield seeds
Low or no cost for eligible farmers
description: Distributes high-quality, climate-resilient seeds to boost crop production at minimal or no cost.

benefits: Easy agricultural loans for short or long term
Offered by Bangladesh Krishi Bank
description: Provides easy access to agricultural credit for farmers through the Bangladesh Krishi Bank.

application.method: Apply directly at Krishi Bank branches

benefits: Tk. 1,000–2,000 per hectare support for diesel irrigation
Promotes irrigation in dry seasons
description: Offers financial assistance for diesel used in irrigation, helping farmers during dry periods.

application.method: Submit form to union agricultural officer

benefits: Subsidies for deep tube wells and solar pumps
Support for irrigation in remote areas
description: Supports development of irrigation systems like tube wells and solar pumps, especially in remote locations.

benefits: Mobile/SMS-based updates on weather, market price
Pest control tips and expert help
description: Delivers agricultural information and advice to farmers through mobile and SMS, including weather updates and pest control tips.

application.method: No formal application – subscribe via mobile

benefits: Insurance coverage against flood, cyclone, drought
Pilot in selected districts
description: Provides crop insurance to protect farmers from natural disasters such as floods and droughts.

application.method: Apply via partner insurance company or NGO

benefits: 50–70% subsidy on agri machinery like tillers, seeders
Helps reduce labor cost and time
description: Offers significant subsidies on agricultural machinery to make farming more efficient and less labor-intensive.

benefits: Free skill development in organic farming, fisheries, livestock
Targeted to landless/ultra-poor farmers
description: Provides free agricultural training for landless and poor farmers under the Ashrayan rehabilitation project.

application.method: Nominated via local Union Parishad or NGO
